hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CT.NAME AS continentName, C.COUNTRY_NAME AS countryName, O.OPERATOR_NAME AS operatorName, O.NETWORK_CODE AS networkCode, O.OPERATOR_CODE AS operatorCode, O.CCNC AS ccnc, C.UTC_TIME_DIFF AS utcTimeDiff, C.UTC_END_TIME_DIFF AS utcEndTimeDiff, (SELECT AGS.DESCRIPTION FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE S, AGREEMENT_STATUS AGS WHERE S.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID = OC.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID AND S.SCHEDULE_TYPE = 1 AND S.STATUS = AGS.STATUS_ID) AS gsmStatus, (SELECT AGS.DESCRIPTION FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE S, AGREEMENT_STATUS AGS WHERE S.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID = OC.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID AND S.SCHEDULE_TYPE = 2 AND S.STATUS = AGS.STATUS_ID) AS gprsStatus, (SELECT AGS.DESCRIPTION FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE S, AGREEMENT_STATUS AGS WHERE S.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID = OC.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID AND S.SCHEDULE_TYPE = 3 AND S.STATUS = AGS.STATUS_ID) AS threegStatus, (SELECT AGS.DESCRIPTION FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE S, AGREEMENT_STATUS AGS WHERE S.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID = OC.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID AND S.SCHEDULE_TYPE = 4 AND S.STATUS = AGS.STATUS_ID) AS camel12Status, (SELECT AGS.DESCRIPTION FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE S, AGREEMENT_STATUS AGS WHERE S.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID = OC.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID AND S.SCHEDULE_TYPE = 5 AND S.STATUS = AGS.STATUS_ID) AS camel3Status, (SELECT AGS.DESCRIPTION FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE S, AGREEMENT_STATUS AGS WHERE S.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID = OC.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID AND S.SCHEDULE_TYPE = 6 AND S.STATUS = AGS.STATUS_ID) AS mmsStatus, ( SELECT RTRIM ( XMLAGG ( XMLELEMENT (C, FREQUENCY || ',') ORDER BY FREQUENCY).EXTRACT('//text()'), ',') FROM OPERATOR_FREQUENCY GROUP BY OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID HAVING OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID = OC.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID) AS frequencies FROM OPERATOR_COUNTRY OC, OPERATOR O, COUNTRY C, CONTINENT CT WHERE OC.COUNTRY_ID = C.COUNTRY_ID AND OC.OPERATOR_ID = O.OPERATOR_ID AND C.CONTINENT_ID = CT.CONTINENT_ID AND OC.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT (OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE STATUS IN (1, 2, 3)) AND (:continentId IS NULL OR CT.CONTINENT_ID = :continentId) AND (:countryId IS NULL OR C.COUNTRY_ID = :countryId) ORDER BY 1, 2, 3

SELECT description AS status, (SELECT COUNT ( * ) FROM main_agreement_schedule WHERE schedule_type = 1 AND status = ags.status_id) AS gsm, (SELECT COUNT ( * ) FROM main_agreement_schedule WHERE schedule_type = 2 AND status = ags.status_id) AS gprs, (SELECT COUNT ( * ) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE schedule_type = 6 AND status = ags.status_id) AS mmsiw, (SELECT COUNT ( * ) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE (schedule_type = 4 OR schedule_type = 5) AND status = ags.status_id) AS camel, (SELECT COUNT ( * ) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE schedule_type = 3 AND status = ags.status_id) AS threeg, (SELECT COUNT ( * ) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE schedule_type = 5 AND status = ags.status_id) AS nrtrde FROM agreement_status ags UNION ALL SELECT 'COUNTRY_COUNT' AS status, (SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT oc.country_id) FROM main_agreement_schedule mas, operator_country oc WHERE mas.schedule_type = 1 AND mas.status IN (1, 2, 3) AND mas.operator_country_id = oc.operator_country_id) AS gsm, (SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT oc.country_id) FROM main_agreement_schedule mas, operator_country oc WHERE mas.schedule_type = 2 AND mas.status IN (1, 2, 3) AND mas.operator_country_id = oc.operator_country_id) AS gprs, (SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT oc.country_id) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE mas, operator_country oc WHERE mas.schedule_type = 6 AND mas.status IN (1, 2, 3) AND mas.operator_country_id = oc.operator_country_id) AS mmsiw, (SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT oc.country_id) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE mas, operator_country oc WHERE (mas.schedule_type = 4 OR mas.schedule_type = 5) AND mas.status IN (1, 2, 3) AND mas.operator_country_id = oc.operator_country_id) AS camel, (SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT oc.country_id) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE mas, operator_country oc WHERE mas.schedule_type = 3 AND mas.status IN (1, 2, 3) AND mas.operator_country_id = oc.operator_country_id) AS threeg, (SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT oc.country_id) FROM MAIN_AGREEMENT_SCHEDULE mas, operator_country oc WHERE mas.schedule_type = 5 AND mas.status IN (1, 2, 3) AND mas.operator_country_id = oc.operator_country_id) AS nrtrde FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TARIFF_CALCULATION_PARAMS (TARIFF_CALC_PARAM_ID, OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID, VALID_MONTH, CURRENCY_EXCHANGE, EXCHANGE, MARKUP, VAT, CURRENCY_ID, PACKET_DATA_MULTIPLIER, GPRS_INIT_CHARGING_INTERVAL, GPRS_ADDITIONAL_DESC, VOICE_INIT_CHARGING_INTERVAL, CALL_SETUP_CHARGE, NATIONAL_VOICE_MO, BACK_HOME_VOICE_MO, ROW_VOICE_MO, SATTELLITE_VOICE_MO, VOICE_MT, SMS_MO, GPRS_IOT_UNIT, ACTIVE, PASSIVE_DATE, MAIN_AGREEMENT_ID, EXCHANGE_RATE, WOM_CALL_SETUP_CHARGE, WOM_NATIONAL_VOICEMO, WOM_BACK_HOME_VOICEMO, WOM_ROW_VOICEMO, WOM_SATTELLITE_VOICEMO, WOM_VOICE_MT, WOM_SMSMO, WOM_GPRS_IOT_UNIT, WM_CALL_SETUP_CHARGE, WM_NATIONAL_VOICEMO, WM_BACK_HOME_VOICEMO, WM_ROW_VOICEMO, WM_SATTELLITE_VOICEMO, WM_VOICE_MT, WM_SMSMO, WM_GPRS_IOT_UNIT) (SELECT SEQ_ROAMING_ID.NEXTVAL, T.OPERATOR_COUNTRY_ID, TO_DATE (?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), T.CURRENCY_EXCHANGE, T.EXCHANGE, T.MARKUP, T.VAT, T.CURRENCY_ID, T.PACKET_DATA_MULTIPLIER, T.GPRS_INIT_CHARGING_INTERVAL, T.GPRS_ADDITIONAL_DESC, T.VOICE_INIT_CHARGING_INTERVAL, T.CALL_SETUP_CHARGE, T.NATIONAL_VOICE_MO, T.BACK_HOME_VOICE_MO, T.ROW_VOICE_MO, T.SATTELLITE_VOICE_MO, T.VOICE_MT, T.SMS_MO, T.GPRS_IOT_UNIT, 1, NULL, NULL, T.EXCHANGE_RATE, T.WOM_CALL_SETUP_CHARGE, T.WOM_NATIONAL_VOICEMO, T.WOM_BACK_HOME_VOICEMO, T.WOM_ROW_VOICEMO, T.WOM_SATTELLITE_VOICEMO, T.WOM_VOICE_MT, T.WOM_SMSMO, T.WOM_GPRS_IOT_UNIT, T.WM_CALL_SETUP_CHARGE, T.WM_NATIONAL_VOICEMO, T.WM_BACK_HOME_VOICEMO, T.WM_ROW_VOICEMO, T.WM_SATTELLITE_VOICEMO, T.WM_VOICE_MT, T.WM_SMSMO, T.WM_GPRS_IOT_UNIT FROM TARIFF_CALCULATION_PARAMS T WHERE TO_DATE(T.VALID_MONTH,'DD/MM/YYYY') = TO_DATE (?, 'DD/MM/YYYY'))
